channel.title: How can i change this? (stupid question)
channel.description: I am using TrisidiaX and i am trying to change the the username character minimum so you can have a 3 letter username (Sam in my case). How can i do this? The closest i have got to finding this is to be able to change the message and for what it is sent.

item.title: How can i change this? (stupid question)
item.dc:creator: @SamMawson SamMawson
item.description:
@SamMawson wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:8, topic:473305”][quote author=SamMawson link=topic=591241.msg4180952#msg4180952 date=1355525050]

No, but why 3? Isn’t the minimum only 1 on rs?

For some reason Trisidia has changed it to 4 characters
[/quote]
You could just make an account, log out of it, change the charactername to Sam, log in with “sam” and wallah? so JUST you can have a 3 letter username?[/quote]
Oh yeah, ill try that now!
EDIT: Still doesn’t let you log in!

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change this? (stupid question)

item.title: How can i change this? (stupid question)
item.dc:creator: @SamMawson SamMawson
item.description:
@SamMawson wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:473305”] if(myUsername.length() > 12) myUsername = capitalize(myUsername.substring(0, 12));
Not sure if that is what’s in TrisidiaX, but that’s what’s in my PI source. Search for that in your client class.[/quote]
Ive got that but that only changes the maximum characters, i need to change the minimum which i cant seem to find anywhere

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change this? (stupid question)

item.title: How can i change this? (stupid question)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

if(myUsername.length() > 12) myUsername = capitalize(myUsername.substring(0, 12));
Not sure if that is what’s in TrisidiaX, but that’s what’s in my PI source. Search for that in your client class.

Read full topic
